message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $13,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in the product. I believe $9,000 would be a fair price for me to purchase it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for the offer, but $9,000 is too low for me.  This product offers significant value, and I believe $11,500 is a fair compromise. What do you say?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. I am willing to increase my offer to $10,500. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
